channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fire risk and strong winds continue in Southern California with potential rain on the horizon
US adults want border security action but mostly oppose arrests in schools, churches: AP-NORC poll
Winter storm that dropped record-breaking snow in New Orleans spreads into Florida and the Carolinas
item.description: A major winter storm that slammed Texas and the northern Gulf Coast is spreading heavy snow, sleet and freezing rain across parts of the Florida panha...

item.title: Doug Emhoff Avenges Kamala’s Viral Handshake Snub
Trump wants the feds to lower prices for Americans. Can he deliver?
item.description: President Trump campaigned on the promise to bring down the U.S. cost of living. That could be easier said than done.

item.title: I’m 52 with a $2,000,000 portfolio, no debt, and burned out — how much can I spend each year if I retire now?
Prince Harry settles lawsuit against Rupert Murdoch's U.K. News Group
item.description: Prince Harry has settled his lawsuit against Rupert Murdoch's British News Group Newspapers for an apology and "substantial damages."

item.title: Police officer shot inside home they were responding to for help
item.description: A police officer has been seriously injured after a suspect opened fire at authorities from inside a home, officials said.

item.title: Mortgage and refinance rates today, January 22, 2025: High rates could be here to stay
Republicans renew efforts to limit people in US illegally from census count
item.description: Republican efforts to exclude people in the U.S. illegally from numbers used to divvy up congressional seats among states have begun anew, with four R...

item.title: Cat mistakenly left on a plane, takes 3 trips covering 4,500 miles
item.description: A Maine coon cat named Mittens made three trips in 24 hours between New Zealand and Australia.

item.title: Trump Administration shuts down White House Spanish-language page, social media
item.description: Within hours of President Donald Trump’s inauguration, his administration took down the Spanish version of the official White House website

item.title: GOP-led states emboldened to roll back trans rights. Dems struggle with response

item.title: Could Buying Palantir Technologies Stock Today Set You Up for Life?
Stay off the Charles River ice, even in the bitter cold. Here's why.
item.description: People have been trying to walk across the icy Charles River in Boston. Massachusetts State Police say it's just not safe.

item.title: AI Stocks: Tech Giants, Cloud Titans Face 'Show Me' Moment. Stargate Project Unveiled.
Once-in-a-lifetime snow hits Gulf Coast, with record-breaking snowfall in Florida
item.description: Florida just saw the most snow on record, with a preliminary 8.8 inches observed in Milton, which is north of Pensacola.

item.title: Patriots safety Jabrill Peppers' trial expected to start today
item.description: New England Patriots safety Jabrill Peppers is scheduled to go on trial Wednesday in Quincy, Massachusetts on domestic violence charges.
